text: Welcome to Acme Corp. We sell high-quality widgets and provide 24/7 customer support. Our return policy is 30 days with receipt.
Shipping usually takes 3-5 business days for domestic orders. Expedited shipping options are available at checkout.
To reset your password, click 'Forgot password' on the login page and follow the emailed instructions. For additional help, contact support@acme.example.
Our pricing tiers include Basic, Pro, and Enterprise. Volume discounts are available for orders over 100 units.
You can track your order using the tracking number sent to your email after shipment. If tracking is unavailable, contact customer support.
